title: tandaiyum tAyum
sahitya:
tandaiyum tAyum pOl undan anbar pAl cintaiyaruL surandu sorindiDum kandanE


anupallavi

  cendUr talam tEDi vandu nalam nADum inda eLiyEn vAzha iniyEnum irangaiyA


caraNam    innal onrinukku pinnonru OngavE tunbam tAngAmal ennuLLam vIngavE
enna sheiduyvadi enru nAn EngavE enru tAn pAngAga ennai nI tAnguvaiyO
